mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (name, description, create_at, update_at) VALUES ( #{name}, #{description}, #{createAt},#{updateAt} );
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET name = #{name}, description= #{description}, update_at= #{updateAt} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.description, COUNT(p.id) AS totalProduct, c.create_at AS createAt, c.update_at AS updateAt FROM category c LEFT JOIN product p ON c.id = p.category_id WHERE (#{keyword} IS NULL OR c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%')) GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.description, c.create_at, c.update_at;
